Pre-Game Insights: Denver Nuggets and Utah Jazz will play a Western Conference matchup on Saturday.
Denver Nuggets went 57-25 overall, 10-6 in Northwest Division play and 33-8 at home last season.
The Nuggets averaged 7.1 steals, 5.6 blocks and 11.8 turnovers per game last season.
Utah Jazz finished 31-51 overall and 5-11 in Northwest Division play during the 2023-24 season.
The Jazz shot 46.7% from the field and 35.4% from 3-point range last season.
Others: Nuggets injuries: Vlatko Cancar (day to day, ankle), Aaron Gordon (day to day, knee), DaRon Holmes II (out for season, achilles).
Jazz injuries: Lauri Markkanen (day to day, back), Taylor Hendricks (out for season, fibula), Isaiah Collier (day to day, hamstring).
